long_description: The women's Nathan Intensity hydration race vest provides storage and hydration on the go; it moves in harmony with your shoulder and upper-back movements to reduce wasted energy. Mesh shoulder straps and back panel channel air across your skin and wick moisture away to improve overall comfort. Insulated reservoir compartment zips open and provides quick, easy access to included two-liter bladder. Bite Me(TM) valve is bent at a 90deg angle; can be easily shut off with a quick twist. Zippered front pocket secures keys, ID and cash; second stretchy mesh front pocket on opposite side stashes energy gels. The Nathan Intensity hydration race vest features two zippered rear compartments that organize additional items.
short_description: The women's Nathan Intensity hydration race vest provides storage and hydration on the go; it moves in harmony with your shoulder and upper-back movements to reduce wasted energy.
